  • convert

convert

Run an IPython notebook (execute all cells) and then convert the notebook to a Sphinx .rst doc page in HTML

Note

You will not need this if using the nbsphinx extension.

Copied and edited from Pyflex documentation

Module Contents

Functions

convert_nb(nbname)

Open up a Jupyter notebook, execute the code inside and save to a new
convert.convert_nb(nbname)

Open up a Jupyter notebook, execute the code inside and save to a new notebook, and then convert the executed notebook to a .rst file for docs.
